channel.title: Docker on Dan [the] Salmon

item.title: Running Oracle 12c on MacOS
item.description: In this post, we will go through the steps of installing Oracle 12c in a Docker container and connect to the database using SQL Developer on a Mac. This is a much lighter way of running Oracle locally compared to running a full Windows virtual machine with VMWare or Virtualbox. 1. Install Docker - If your Mac is newer than 2010 You can simply install “Docker for Mac”. Download and install “Docker for Mac” from here (You’ll have to create a quick account to download it.
